title: OpenAI's ChatGPT: AI Chatbot Soars with Millions of Users, Faces Challenges
originSummary: OpenAI's ChatGPT has become popular among Fortune 500 companies, resulting in updates to GPT, such as the new model GPT-4 Turbo and a multimodal API.
ChatGPT now supports image generation and has reached 100 million weekly active users.

OpenAI is facing challenges, including accusations of promoting cheating and concerns about child safety. The company has temporarily suspended new subscriptions for ChatGPT Plus and has experienced outages due to a DDoS attack. OpenAI is also exploring AI's potential in education and planning to create a marketplace for users to create and monetize their own GPT versions.

title: Mira Murati: OpenAI's New Interim CEO Replacing Sam Altman
originSummary: Mira Murati is the interim CEO of OpenAI, taking over from Sam Altman, who was removed due to a lack of communication with the board.
Murati, with a background in mechanical engineering, has been with OpenAI since 2022 and has been instrumental in the development of AI products like ChatGPT and DALL-E.
OpenAI aims to strike a balance between showcasing AI capabilities while ensuring responsible use and preventing the creation of deepfake media.
Prime Minister Narendra Modi expressed concerns about AI misuse.
The Cambridge Dictionary chose 'hallucinate' as Word of the Year 2023 in relation to AI.
Air India has implemented an AI-enabled virtual assistant.

Notable events include Russian central banker Aleksashenko being put on a wanted list, the situation of Kerala nurse Nimisha Priya on death row, Israeli air strikes in south Gaza, and Taiwan opposition parties failing to announce a joint presidential candidate.

title: OpenAI's Game-Changing GPT Store Unleashes Customizable Chatbots
originSummary: OpenAI has launched GPTs (Generative Pre-trained Transformers) through the GPT Store, allowing users to customize chatbots for AI interactions.
These GPTs are currently accessible only to subscribers and offer a wide range of capabilities, including a hotdog identifier and a tattoo design generator.
The practical applications of these customizable chatbots include health advice, recipe generation, and website design.

title: Luminance's AI Advancement Revolutionizes Contract Negotiations
originSummary: Luminance, an AI firm, has developed a large language model (LLM) that can autonomously negotiate contracts, revolutionizing the legal industry.
The AI technology, called Autopilot, streamlines the process of reviewing and modifying legal documents, saving lawyers time and allowing them to focus on more critical tasks.

Luminance's specialized approach offers advantages over more general-purpose AI tools and demonstrates the potential for AI to transform routine legal work, bringing efficiency and precision to the industry.

title: OpenAI's CEO Sam Altman fired over communication concerns, co-founder Greg Brockman also departs
originSummary: Sam Altman has been terminated from his role as CEO of OpenAI due to concerns regarding his communication with the board.
Co-founder and former board chair, Greg Brockman, has also announced his departure from the company.
OpenAI's ChatGPT, which saw widespread adoption and sparked the growth of generative AI tools, was a significant contribution by Altman. The company is now being led by interim CEO Mira Murati.

title: OpenAI Fires CEO Altman, Chairman Resigns Amid Leadership Changes
originSummary: OpenAI's board of directors has fired CEO Sam Altman due to a lack of honesty in his communications.
CTO Mira Murati is now the interim CEO of OpenAI.
Altman's departure is unexpected, as the company has recently made positive announcements about new services and updates.

title: OpenAI sacks CEO Sam Altman over communication concerns
originSummary: OpenAI has terminated the CEO, Sam Altman, due to a lack of confidence in his leadership and inconsistent communication.
The company has named Mira Murati, the Chief Technology Officer, as the interim CEO while searching for a permanent replacement.
Co-founder Greg Brockman has also stepped down as chairman of the board, leading to speculation and controversy in the tech industry.
